attributes.action: To make sure all dangerous and aggressive dogs are muzzled as well as kept on a non-extended lead
attributes.additional_details: All dog owners that have had involvement with the police and their dog is aggressive must have consequences. As a punishment, all dogs must be required to wear  a muzzle and not to be on an extended lead. All dog owners who are able to train their dog properly should not fear their dog being harmed within a public place. Justice must be served.
